overview: The live cinema broadcast of this large-scale masterpiece Casse-Noisette Compagnie celebrates the 30th anniversary of Les Ballets de Monte Carlo. Ballet de Monte Carloâ€™s choreographer and director, Jean-Christophe Maillot uses his life story as the narrative line of this enchanting, poignant and often complex ballet performance set in a circus.
title: Casse-Noisette Compagnie
